exit_codes.131: SIGQUIT - Process quit with core dump.
exit_codes.132: SIGILL - Illegal Instruction (CPU cannot execute this).
exit_codes.136: SIGFPE - Floating point exception (e.g., division by zero).
exit_codes.137: SIGKILL - Process killed by OOM (Out of Memory).
exit_codes.138: SIGBUS - Bus error (Hardware or bad memory access).
exit_codes.141: SIGPIPE - Broken pipe (No reader for this output).

service_patterns.AH00072: Apache: Port bind failed. Check if port 80/443 is used by another app.
service_patterns.Address already in use: Network conflict: Port is already bound. Use 'ss -tulpn' to check.
service_patterns.Access denied for user: DB Error: Authentication failed or insufficient permissions.
service_patterns.Can't connect to local MySQL server: MySQL Error: Socket file missing or service is down.
service_patterns.No such file or directory: Path Error: A required file or binary is missing.
service_patterns.Permission denied: Security Error: Check file/folder permissions or SELinux/AppArmor.
